name: BreastLocationClockCS
title: Breast Location Clock CodeSystem
description: Breast body location angles (expressed in clock-face units) code system.

concept.definition:
Just like the hands of a clock, this is how to describe 
the position of the tumor 
in the breast. 
1 o'clock position is at the 1 o'clock position and 
in the Upper Inner Quandrant 
(UIQ) of the breast. 


Valid for the following modalities: MG US.

(UIQ) of the breast. 


Valid for the following modalities: MG US.
